data.eml:eml: Review of Chinese species of genus Scaphomonus Viraktamath, 2009 (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae), with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Xing, Ji-Chun, Li, Zi-Zhong (2013): Review of Chinese species of genus Scaphomonus Viraktamath, 2009 (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 3637 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3637.1.6
